infoHints.bestFeatured: Get to know our partners! They are the ones who give you tasks and surveys for the Task Wall, which will help you earn more RLT.
infoHints.offerwallsTip: Check the list of our partners providing tasks for the Task Wall

howToGet.chooseDescription: Choose from the list a task/survey you want to complete
howToGet.checkDescription: Read the Task Details carefully to complete it
howToGet.completeDescription: Complete the Task in accordance with the rules
howToGet.rewardDescription: Your Reward will be automatically credited to your balance in up to 7 days.
howToGet.tutorialTitle: Task Wall Leaderboard: how it works?
howToGet.textModal: Take part in the Taskwall. Complete tasks and earn points for them. At the end of the tournament, participants receive additional rewards according to their placement on the leaderboard.
